short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Trustpilot reviews and export them from the Trustpilot page to a CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Trustpilot reviews and export them from the Trustpilot page to a CSV file. The Trustpilot Review Exporter is a robust Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience with Trustpilot reviews. This plugin offers a range of powerful features to streamline the collection and analysis of Trustpilot reviews.
